Docs.summary: Provides a notification mechanism for a tracking service to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure about changes to the for a particular workflow .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Tracking services manage the tracking profiles available to the runtime tracking infrastructure. A tracking service that implements <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> can provide notifications to the runtime tracking infrastructure when a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> either changes or is no longer valid. The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> events and updates its cache when these events are raised. This decreases the number of requests for tracking profiles that the runtime tracking infrastructure makes to a tracking service. Note: the runtime tracking infrastructure still uses the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A> methods of the tracking service, but it does not call them as frequently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tracking service can raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> should not be tracked.

Docs.summary: Occurs when a for a specific workflow is updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A tracking service can raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is available for the indicated workflow <xref:System.Type>. The workflow <xref:System.Type> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> are passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.
